title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2467/92 of 25 August 1992 extending the list of arable crops laid down in Regulation (EEC) No 1765/92
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2467/92  of 25 August 1992  extending the list of arable crops laid down in Regulation (EEC) No 1765/92
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following arable crops are added to Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 1765/92:
CN code  Description     I. CEREALS   0709 90 60  Sweet corn  II. PROTEIN CROPS   0708 10  Peas (Pisum sativum)

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 July 1992. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 August 1992. For the Commission
Karel VAN MIERT
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 181, 1. 7. 1992, p. 12.
